lexUnit.name: purr.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a cat) make a low continuous vibratory sound expressing contentment.

sentence.text: The engines became quieter , purring quite ordinarily as they approached these resting places .
The engine purred throatily , doors clunked with glamorous solidity , the car felt luxurious and astronomically expensive .
A boat 's engine , throttled back and purring softly , somewhere beyond the headland to the east .
Purring loudly , Cas padded towards her , tail erect , bright green eyes unblinking .
The Mercedes began to purr softly and then swept powerfully away into the streets of Amsterdam .
Juliet followed her into the house , and the cat purred loudly , rubbing against her legs .
The engine purred again .
He stepped on to my lap and began to tread my crotch , purring loudly .
` It probably is a sign of contentment , but we also know that cats purr when they 're under stress , " says one expert .
A kitten , deprived of its own mother and reared by people , may fail to learn to purr or miaow .
She snatched Buster from his play and we went back into the house where she held him close to her face , laughing as the big cat purred and arched himself ecstatically against her cheek .
The fire will purr and tinkle in the grate ,
Attila purred and cooed , placed my naked son upon my breast and went out to make , ` A nice cup of hot , sweet tea ! "
For instance , an adult female will purr while suckling her kittens and when she courts a male .
The telephone purred on the coffee table .
The clock ticked merrily , the fire whispered and crackled , the cat purred upon the window sill , sitting foursquare and smug after its midday meal .
The engine was purring like a tiger .
No wonder you 're purring with delight .
The kitten was cradled in her arms and she ran her fingers gently up and down its stomach so that it purred with delight .
The voice purred with a fury that made it no less memorable .
As the cat put its head down to rub against her , she reached up with her arm , and to her surprise the cat quite readily padded on to her shoulder and nestled there , purring .
OK , if you want to get picky guitars should purr , destroy and rejuvenate , and dance beats should prowl , pace and threaten .
